document.full_text: authorities hunting for a transient suspected in a bomb blast outside a los angeles-area synagogue said on monday they now believe he left town later that day on a greyhound bus.
document.title: synagogue blast suspect thought headed east: fbi
lines_and_colors: authorities hunting for a transient suspected in a bomb blast outside a los angeles-area synagogue said on monday they now believe he left town later that day on a greyhound bus.
